3cf6b764-2289-4c30-9137-a33028d406b6.description: Sigma's Delivery Partner Certification demonstrates that recipients have completed Hands-On Sigma training and have built an end-to-end Sigma solution. Earners have demonstrated their understanding of Sigma Architecture, Data Modeling, Data Visualization, Metrics, Governance, and architecting scalable solutions with Sigma
3cf6b764-2289-4c30-9137-a33028d406b6.name: Sigma Delivery Partner Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Earners have completed a 5 hour course covering Sigma's architecture, design best practices, and scaling Sigma to meet an organization's data analytics needs. Recipients must complete all related coursework including a capstone project that is judged based on design and inclusion of Sigma's core functionality.
